Instruction: "Add water, salt, honey, eggs, melted butter or margarine, flour, and yeast in the order specified to the bread machine. Select the Dough cycle and start the machine."

Shape the dough after the first rising by dividing it into three or four equal pieces. Braid the pieces together, tuck the ends under, and pinch to seal. Place the braided dough on a greased baking tray, or alternatively, place it in a greased 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. Allow the dough to rise until doubled in size.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Bake until the crust is a deep golden brown, about 35 to 45 minutes.
